results.title: Bolton Valley Nordic Backcountry
results.description: Awesome ski resort in Vermont with 100km of ungroomed backcountry terrain.

results.title: Charlevoix Traverse
results.description: A 100km hut to hut ski tour in the rugged Charlevoix region.

results.title: Logan Circuit - Chic Chocs Ski Trip
results.description: A hut to hut ski tour in the Gaspesie. So much snow.

results.title: Cascade Mountain Hike
results.description: A classic Adirondack hike. Close to the road, lots of people, beautiful views.

results.title: Montagne D'Argent
results.description: Beautiful climbing area in the Laurentians.

results.title: Lusk Caves
results.description: A Gatineau park hike with underground caves. Bring a headlamp and a towel.
